meanings.definition: The belief in the existence of only one God.
meanings.sent2: Monotheisms are prevalent in certain religions.
meanings.sent3: The debate over monotheisms can get quite heated.
meanings.sent4: In a world of chaos, monotheisms provide a guiding light.
meanings.sent5: The concept of monotheisms is deeply ingrained in some cultures.

meanings.definition: The religions that worship only one God.
meanings.sent2: People of different backgrounds may follow monotheisms.
meanings.sent3: Learning about various monotheisms can be fascinating.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of beliefs, monotheisms stand out like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The unity found in monotheisms can be comforting to believers.
